mosinstall.name: Gallery2 Sidebar module
mosinstall.author: Michiel Bijland
mosinstall.license: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description: This module displays the Gallery 2 sidebar in a module position.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (element.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
